summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.4°C) and outside temperature (down 4.1°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 695 m), and light levels (up 4820 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1644 m), and light levels (up 6788 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 695.5m lower than yesterday, 612.4m lower than the past week, 1643.5m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 1059m and a peak of 3380m, averaging 1028.8m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
